casebody.data:
No. D-2502. In the Matter of Discipline of Bruce Nicholls. 562 U.S. 809, 131 S. Ct. 398,

178 L. Ed. 2d 263,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 7515. October 4, 2010.

Bruce Nicholls, of Gloucester, Massachusetts, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 *264days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
